title: Report system requires a total overhaul
body:
Lobby: Jungler says "Auto filled, swap anyone?" Nobody swaps with him, he picks wukong and proceeds to flame the entire team for not pinging, blaming them for literally everything that happens to him

Lobby: Bot/adc gets autofilled, hovers yasuo. I ban Yasuo because he is not a viable ADC bot lane and he is probably going to snipe mid lane and troll the team, Gets in game, dies twice, Goes to the wall of our base while outer turret is still up, sits afk for 9 minutes while my wife as support struggles to save the tower as a solo Janna, I call him out on afking, he starts playing, feeds another 2-3 kills and then starts spamming chat with "Mid why you feeding mid why you feeding"

Enemy mid laner goes to ALL chat, starts trash talking me, The AFK and the Inter jungle say "Ahri is afk trolling" after i call them out on their bullshit, Game ends, I get 14 day suspension after obviously they dogpile reported me. 

Your system needs some serious work Riot. I do my best every game, ive played all day nonstop for the last week or 3 and ive been trying my best to climb my rank, now im freaking banned for 14 days because of people that TROLLED ME, and not the other way around? Your automation system is obviously not picking up on anything right, Lucian was literally AFK for over 12 minutes, and you flag me as being a troll??? This is seriously messed up...

replies.body:
>Lobby: Jungler says "Auto filled, swap anyone?" Nobody swaps with him, he picks wukong and proceeds to flame the entire team for not pinging, blaming them for literally everything that happens to him

Doesn't sound like a person that would avoid a poor behavior punishment for long.

>Lobby: Bot/adc gets autofilled, hovers yasuo. I ban Yasuo because he is not a viable ADC bot lane and he is probably going to snipe mid lane and troll the team

If their intention is to troll the team, banning a single champion is hardly going to prevent them of that.

>Enemy mid laner goes to ALL chat, starts trash talking me

Sounds like another person that wouldn't be able to avoid a poor behavior punishment for long.

>now im freaking banned for 14 days because of people that TROLLED ME, and not the other way around?

You're punished for your behavior and your behavior alone.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=iX1XggvY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-18T03:15:50.199+0000)
> 
> You're punished for your behavior and your behavior alone.

It does beg the question of what OPs chat log looks like. 

Unfortunately without a system like tribunal that would let people judge the entire chat log, the automated system will punish you if you tilt and flame back at trolls when people may have forgiven you.

You realize that the tribunal overwhelmingly elected to not go lighter on players just because they were responding to someone else? Hence why when Riot switched to the IFS they coded it to ignore context altogether.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=iX1XggvY,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-18T03:50:45.265+0000)
>
> You realize that the tribunal overwhelmingly elected to not go lighter on players just because they were responding to someone else? Hence why when Riot switched to the IFS they coded it to ignore context altogether.

You realize I used conditional language such as "may have" as in no guarantees that anyone would be sympathetic or do more than skim and vote?

When I was voting in the tribunal, I would be judging the person's chat alone, regardless of what the context is.

Though if there was just 1 game of minor tilting, I would pardon them. If there was 12 games of tilt, it's pretty much autoclick on punish.

> Lobby: Bot/adc gets autofilled, hovers yasuo. I ban Yasuo because he is not a viable ADC bot lane and he is probably going to snipe mid lane and troll the team

You got him off to a fantastic start there.  While banning a teammate hover is completely legal and not punishable whatsoever, what do you expect when you banned what could be someone's comfort champ he wanted to bring into a role he is not comfortable with (autofill)?  Dick move...

> [{quoted}](name=Nikki,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=iX1XggvY,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-04-18T02:50:16.714+0000)

> obviously they dogpile reported me. 

Not much to add that other haven't said, besides that there's no such thing as "dogpile" reporting.  1 report = 9, and the amount of reports (beyond 1) changes the system's decision exactly 0.

EDIT: also, Yasuo is indeed a viable ADC.  I have a friend that I duo with and we do it all the time and probly have like a 70% WR with that.

You are punished because of what you said.
you aren't justified to flame someone if they do it to you.
i can't say "fk u bish" just because someone said something to me.
(unless its a brother or friend in a 5 man)
